title: Error 004
body: I have been trying to solve this error since the day that patch 7.8 was present. I have tried the hextech repair thing for quite a long time and now it is unable to open for some unknown reason. I would like to know what is causing the error 004. It also showed in the logs that system clock error. Please help me fix this problem. Thanks!

replies.body: That 004 Error is a pretty good sign that your OS is blocking League from opening. Without the right permissions, Windows can sometimes not recognize League and block it from opening entirely. You can get around that by following our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those permissions in place. Hit me back if you're still having any issues after that!
I'm having the same issue, this been happening since they released the new champions. I've tried the permission guide and still doesn't work and even tried hextech repair tool.

1. Close everything else when running League.
 * Error 004 is caused by programs on your computer disrupting League's installation. Whether the programs are CPU heavy or network heavy, either or both can result in this error.

2. Antivirus / Firewall software can also result in this error being displayed, try disabling them completely to see if they were the cause.

I have tried turning firewall off, only league running, and turned my anti virus off. Yet it always stop at the 70% and the error 004 just pops up. This has never happened before until the new update.
Thank you for your help but I have done everything that this website has told. Yet, it is impossible to patch the newest update for some unknown reason.

They have yet to even understand the cause. I've been trying to figure it out myself, but RIOT employees are no help as of right now. Lastly, they seem to not care, as they do not respond to these posts quick enough.

Error 004 is caused by programs on your computer disrupting League's installation. Whether the programs are CPU heavy or network heavy, either or both can result in this error.

Antivirus / Firewall software can also result in this error being displayed which is why we ask players to grant League permission to run as League can and in some cases is blocked by AV/FW software.
